nodes.text: Shakra was female reptilian bounty hunter that, along with Boba Fett, finally corseted Bornan Thul. Thul escaped however aboard Zekk's ship, the Lightning Rod. When he left, he set his ship to self-destruct. Shakra went aboard the ship, hoping to slice into Bornan's files, but she was disintegrated along with Bornan's ship when it exploded.
